INT-444.ExpectedResult: The user should be able to see Global ASTM Standards listed under the About ASTM Overview header.

EdgeCases.description: About ASTM Overview header is missing
EdgeCases.expected: Test should fail with a clear error that the header is not present.

EdgeCases.description: Global ASTM Standards list is empty
EdgeCases.expected: Test should fail and log that standards are not listed.

EdgeCases.description: Learn More button is not clickable
EdgeCases.expected: Test should fail and report button is disabled or not interactable.

EdgeCases.description: User is not logged in (if authentication is required)
EdgeCases.expected: Test should verify if the standards are visible to unauthenticated users or fail gracefully.

EdgeCases.description: Page loads slowly or times out
EdgeCases.expected: Test should handle timeout and report as a failure with appropriate message.

BoundaryValues.scenario: Maximum number of standards listed (e.g., 100 items)
BoundaryValues.expected: All standards should be visible and the UI should not break or overflow.

BoundaryValues.scenario: Minimum number of standards listed (e.g., 1 item)
BoundaryValues.expected: The single standard should be visible under the header.
